_doc: Modular Dzine prompt system. Fixed blocks never change. Variable blocks swap 1 axis per day. Paste assembled prompt into 'Character action & scene'.

fixed_blocks.core_identity: Ray (use the existing Ray character identity and the verified face reference). Same exact person, same facial structure, same hairline, same beard shape, same nose and jaw proportions. Medium close-up talking head. Calm neutral expression. Looking directly into the camera lens. Mouth closed, relaxed lips, clean lip line for lip-sync. Clean jawline and chin contour, no shadow artifacts.
fixed_blocks.camera: Eye-level camera, centered framing, stable composition, headroom 8-10%. 85mm lens look (no wide angle), natural perspective, no facial distortion. Shoulders relaxed. Hands out of frame.
fixed_blocks.lighting: Soft key light from front-left 45 degrees, gentle fill from front-right, subtle rim light for separation. Face lighting neutral and clean. No harsh shadows under nose/lips/chin.
fixed_blocks.quality: Photorealistic, natural skin texture, consistent pores, high-end cinematic realism, stable features across generations, clean background bokeh.
fixed_blocks.negative: open mouth, teeth showing, exaggerated smile, distorted lips, double chin artifacts, messy beard noise, hairstyle change, sunglasses, hat, heavy wrinkles, low-res, oversharpen, cartoon, anime, CGI, hands visible, extra fingers, text, logos, busy background, patterned clothing.

environment.A_office_a: Modern minimalist tech office, blurred glass partitions, soft daylight, subtle bokeh, no readable text, no logos, neutral professional vibe.
environment.B_office_b: Same office style, but background with blurred window + faint city lights bokeh, still minimal, no readable text, no logos.
environment.C_studio: Professional studio backdrop, deep charcoal grey gradient, clean, non-distracting, subtle bokeh.

outfit.1_black_tee: Solid black crew-neck t-shirt, premium cotton, no logos, no patterns.
outfit.2_navy_tee: Solid dark navy crew-neck t-shirt, premium cotton, no logos, no patterns.
outfit.3_grey_hoodie: Solid dark grey hoodie, minimal, no logos, no drawstrings visible.

accent.1_warm: Background ambient slightly warm, face lighting remains neutral.
accent.2_cool: Background ambient slightly cool, face lighting remains neutral.
accent.3_rim: Very subtle rim light tint only, face lighting neutral.

daily_rotation._doc: Change max 1 axis per day. Default safe config: C_studio + 1_black_tee + 1_warm.

prebuilt_combos._doc: Ready-to-use daily combos. Pick one, paste blocks in order.

style_dna_extraction_protocol._doc: When analyzing a reference video/image, extract these 4 outputs.
outputs: style_dna: 10 bullets (lente, luz, cor, enquadramento, fundo, pele)
replicable_prompt: prompt that replicates this style with travas
qc_rubric: what fails QC for this specific style

keyframe_batch._doc: One-time batch to build keyframe library. Generate 60, keep 12.
